c19bg 0.1.1
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

c19_bg_data()

Provides access to Bulgarian COVID-19 data from data.egov.bg.

c19_deaths_age()

Plot deaths in a country by age band and week.

c19_deaths_factor()

Plot excess deaths factors for a selection of countries.

c19_deaths_map()

Plot comparative deaths map for EU+ countries.

c19_deaths_total()

Plot total weekly deaths for a country.

c19_estimate_r()

Estimate reproductive number for Bulgaria.

c19_eu_data()

Provides access to ECDC/EUROSTAT COVID-19 data.

c19_eu_plots_save()

Save various EU plots.

c19_eu_weekly()

Weekly plot using ECDC/EUROSTAT data.

c19_heat()

Plot incidence/100K heat map along age bands.

c19_heat_save()

Saves the incidence heat map.

c19_inkmagick()

Produce high-quality PNG & JPEG (along with SVG).

c19_oblasts()

Plot oblast incidence (per 100K or raw), faceted (map) or lumped ("spaghetti plot").

c19_oblasts_save()

Saves the four oblasts plots (spaghetti / faceted versions of case counts and incidence per 100K).

c19_reload()

Reload all data from disk (or from the Internet).

c19_r_plot()

Plot R, incl. daily cases and 7d-rolling mean, 7d testing and positivity.

c19_r_plot_save()

Saves the R plot.

c19_save_all()

Calls output funcs with some default params.

c19_var_plot()

Various plots from data.gov.bg data.

c19_var_plot_save()

Saves various BG plots based on data.gov.bg.
